Plot: A suburban family moves to a new neighborhood with their large yet lovable Great Dane, who has a tendency to wreak havoc in his own oblivious way.
Title: Marmaduke
Writer: Tim Rasmussen, Vince Di Meglio, Brad Anderson (comic), Phil Leeming (comic)
Actors: Owen Wilson, Emma Stone, George Lopez, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
tomatoConsensus: Dull and unfunny, Marmaduke offers family filmgoers little more than another round of talking animals and scatological humor.
